citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), Office of Oceanic and Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)
citeinfo.title: Bering Sea and Gulf of Alaska Winds (1946-1982)

descript.abstract: This data is a subset of the Fleet Numerical Oceanographic Center (FNOC) gridded wind data for the Bering Sea and the Gulf of Alaska near Kodiak Island These data span the years 1976 to 1982, and are stored on 54 disk files (48.9 MB) at the Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory in Seattle, Washington. NOAAServer Codes: [L 70 50 -130 -180] ; nodateline

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
